title: Karthus seeing the new Taric ult be like

replies.body:
{{champion:44}} don't {{champion:203}} worry {{champion:432}} guys {{champion:223}} we {{champion:114}} don't {{champion:245}} hate {{champion:11}} Karthus

RITO PLS
{{champion:105}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:26}}
you forgot {{champion:127}}
You forgot {{summoner:7}} {{summoner:21}} {{item:3401}}
were talking about karthus ult m8
In that case, let me direct you to exhibit F, where we have our lifesteal items.
How about {{item:3190}} ?
You forgot these guys: {{champion:105}} and {{champion:8}}
{{champion:57}}  {{champion:127}}  {{champion:238}} {{champion:421}} can all dodge it aswell
Elise can rappel and give him the finger unless that got changed.
I like how Elise and Fizz can dodge a DEATH BEAM by... Going up higher a bit. And Yi can dodge it just by going fast.

Karthus gets shit on so hard man... Hes not even death anymore since {{champion:203}} is a thing now :(

Buff Karthus 2016 ;_;
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} rip my main T_T
What is the new ult?
After a short channel, all allies around Taric get invulnerable
Oooh, all of them. Cool!
on top of that taric can move while being invuln, not sure if allies can to.
all of them. Also, the ult is also cast around the person who his W is attached to
Truly Taric will be busted in competitive play once picked up, his level 6 turret diving will be unbeatable.
You mean he'll be completely banned every time. :P
I think the proper term is Lulu'd.
Fuck Lulu. :(
I'd like to ;D
Damn things escalated quickly.
A short channel? The delay is 2.5 seconds long!
its an AOE invincibility for allies only. just let that sink in

> [{quoted}](name=awbiyagvfUWRH,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EA1hdWmO,comment-id=0002000000010000,timestamp=2016-04-06T00:51:14.068+0000)
>
> its an AOE invincibility for allies only. just let that sink in

I foresee a permaban champ
idk whether he will be pick/ban in soloQ but in the lcs? definitely
And then you take in the fact that they got a Kindred and Bard too

and a kayle and a liss/zilean
5x immortality team

{{champion:30}} fuk this im done!

im going back to the Shadow isle and work on my solo singing career 
morde ! you take over.

{{champion:82}} but no one likes me...
MM would like to have a word with you about that last one.
Taric only has 0.5 seconds to react to Kartus though or it's gonna be too late.
Ha, it's true that Taric' ult is going to be terrifically efficient against Karthus' ult, if we assume that he's targetting a particular low health teammate.
WHat about Late game teamfights?? That's likek half of Karthus's dmg gone if Taric times his ulti correctly.
As if Karthus needed another counter.
They will just rework Khartus at some point. I mean he feels pretty useless for a while now and there is no reason to pick him.

At least unlike Soraka, he has to be near the teammate in question.
Or have twisted fate take the W and teleport to the ally to save them.

At that point you'd probably ask why he wasn't just playing shen though.
The link drops if they go too far, too. Not sure how far is "too far", but I'm willing to bet it's something like... Half of Shen's sword link?
I think its the size of the activation, check the update video.
Cast range is 1000 units. Tether Range is 1500
I'm both happy and sad because Karthus is my first main and Taric is my second main lol

Karthus ult needs 3 seconds, taric ult 2.5

Means you have to react fast as fck when you want to dodge it

Taric Sick Plays: I pressed R really fast.

I can already see the YT videos xD
